mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MOTHERBOARD_MANUFACTURER MM JOIN MOTHERBOARD_SOCKET_TYPE MST ON MM.COMPUTER_PART_IDX = MST.COMPUTER_PART_IDX JOIN MOTHERBOARD_CHIPSET MC ON MST.COMPUTER_PART_IDX = MC.COMPUTER_PART_IDX JOIN MOTHERBOARD_FORM_FACTOR MFF ON MC.COMPUTER_PART_IDX = MFF.COMPUTER_PART_IDX

SELECT MOTHERBOARD_IDX, MOTHERBOARD_TOTAL_DATA, MOTHERBOARD_SFILE_NAME, MOTHERBOARD_SOCKET_TYPE, MOTHERBOARD_CHIPSET, MOTHERBOARD_MEMORY_TYPE, MOTHERBOARD_MEMORY_SLOTS, MOTHERBOARD_MAXIMUM_MEMORY_SIZE, MOTHERBOARD_FORM_FACTOR, COMPUTER_PART_IDX FROM MOTHERBOARD
